title: RBNZ assistant governor says bank's August cut will help lift inflation
text:
RBNZ assistant governor says bank's August cut will help lift inflation

Economy 42 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 06:56PM ET)

RBNZ assistant governor says bank's August cut will help lift inflation (Reuters) - Reserve Bank of New Zealand assistant governor Christian Hawkesby said on Tuesday the bank's surprise 50 basis point cut in August would lift inflation. "We felt this commitment (to providing monetary policy stimulus) should support a lift in inflation expectations and an eventual lift in actual inflation," he said in a speech to a markets conference in Sydney.
